text: John Rogers Edelman (born July 27, 1935, in Philadelphia) is an American former Major League Baseball pitcher. Edelman signed with the Milwaukee Braves as a bonus baby free agent in 1955 and played with the team that year. Edelman played at the collegiate level at West Chester University. He stood tall and weighed . ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Philadelphia Category:Milwaukee Braves players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:West Chester Golden Rams baseball players Category:Baseball players from Pennsylvania
title: John Edelman
